item.name: 7 Wonders
item.comment: I used to dislike this game. In time, with a lot of plays it kind of growed on me. I have fun playing it now :)

item.name: Alchemists
item.comment: Rated after only one play. My friends find it strange. I really LOVE IT! I'm afraid they wouldn't want to play it any more :(

item.name: Alhambra: Big Box
item.comment: Cool game when non- gaming friends stop by. Also one day with my crildren :)

item.name: Battlestar Galactica
item.comment: This is for me an amazing game! From the first time I have played it in my gameroom till this day. Each game is a different experience, I enjoy the story part, the interaction part, the strategy part, the little luck (fate) part, everything in one. Really really love it!

item.name: Betrayal at House on the Hill
Cards Against Humanity
item.comment: This is for me an excellent party game. I have a lot of fun with it. In this category I rate it by 9. Still, it's not the same 9 as non - party games get. Because mostly I'm a serious boardgamer :)

item.name: Dungeons & Dragons: The Legend of Drizzt Board Game
A Game of Thrones: The Board Game (Second Edition)
item.comment: This is clearly subjective opinion, don't like wargames and am not much into backstabing and bluffing and so.

item.name: Last Night on Earth: The Zombie Game
Legendary Encounters: An Alien Deck Building Game
The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game
Lords of Waterdeep: Scoundrels of Skullport
item.comment: This expansion adds a lot to the original game. I have dozens of plays behind me and i still enjoy it very very much. One of my First loves and still the great game.

item.name: Lords of Waterdeep: Scoundrels of Skullport
Race for the Galaxy: Alien Artifacts
Race for the Galaxy: Rebel vs Imperium
Race for the Galaxy: The Brink of War
Race for the Galaxy: The Brink of War
Race for the Galaxy: The Gathering Storm
Rex: Final Days of an Empire
Robinson Crusoe: Adventures on the Cursed Island
Sid Meier's Civilization: The Board Game
Smash Up: Science Fiction Double Feature
Star Trek Deck Building Game: The Next Generation
item.comment: I am a great fan of this series and I enjoy this game a lot. I find it has a lot of luck involved, but I don't mind. I enjoy the experience of exploring the universe, fighting Borg and so. I like it very much.

item.name: Star Trek Deck Building Game: The Next Generation â€“ The Next Phase
Star Trek Deck Building Game: The Next Generation â€“ The Next Phase
Terra Mystica
item.comment: This is one of my favourite euro games, it is apsolutely perfect.

item.name: Viticulture
item.wishlistcomment: Just played this game yesterday and i was stunned by how cool and interesting it is.

item.name: Zug um Zug: Deutschland
item.comment: Cool game when non- gaming friends stop by. Also one day with my crildren :)
